meanings.definition: The quality of being visually attractive or pleasing.
meanings.sent1: The sightliness of the garden was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The sightliness of the painting captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The sightliness of the clown's outfit made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile added a touch of sightliness to the room, brightening it up.
meanings.sent5: The sightliness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being visually appealing.
meanings.sent1: The sightliness of the model's dress was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The sightliness of the landscape left us in awe.
meanings.sent3: The sightliness of the cake made it hard to resist eating.
meanings.sent4: The sightliness of the city lights at night was like a sea of stars.
meanings.sent5: The sightliness of the flowers in the garden brought joy to all who passed by.
